welcomeMessage: Welcome to MUXO SHELL! Type 'muxo help' to see available commands.

muxo help.response:
Available Commands:

  muxo meet [subcommand]    Connect with your interests.
    ├─ interest       # Topics you like
    ├─ p-languages    # Programming languages you know
    ├─ design         # Your design experience
    ├─ hobbies        # Your hobbies

  muxo work [subcommand]    Explore your professional side.
    ├─ now           # Your current work
    ├─ past          # Your past experiences

  muxo social             # Connect socially

  clear              # Clear the terminal

  muxo exit             # Exit the shell

muxo meet interest.response: I am interested in software development and graphic design. I try to stay as active as possible in these two fields. I am constantly developing projects or participating in projects.

muxo meet p-languages.response: I am currently actively writing HTML, CSS, and JS. As a JS framework, I use React. Additionally, I write Angular at my workplace. For CSS, I use Tailwind, but sometimes I also use Bootstrap. I also use SASS when needed.

muxo meet design.response: In graphic design, I mainly focus on digital design. I actively use Photoshop and Illustrator. Additionally, I actively use Figma for the applications I'm developing. By the end of the day, I have a strong proficiency with these three tools.

muxo meet hobbies.response: I work on graphic design projects as a hobby, such as posters, jersey designs, or logos. Besides that, I enjoy playing computer games and writing. I also closely follow the Counter Strike e-sports scene and try to watch the matches whenever I can.
